## Browser.defaultBrowserContext() method

Returns the default browser context. The default browser context cannot be closed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
defaultBrowserContext(): BrowserContext;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[BrowserContext](./puppeteer.browsercontext.md)
